attributes.action: That the game between England and Argentina on June 22, 1986 be replayed due to 'the hand of god' goal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel this game should be replayed due to a goal being scored by Diego Maradona in which he used his hand.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
